attributes.action: Stop the Higher Education green paper!
attributes.additional_details:
For more info on the policies threatened by the green paper see: http://bit.ly/1Q8ajO5

To see how you can fight against the HE green paper visit:
www.anticuts.com

The full green paper can be found here: http://bit.ly/1Peri0X
attributes.background:
If this green paper consultation reaches legislation unchanged it will be nothing less than the end of public education. It will be a fully-marketised Higher Education system, and moves towards uncapped fees.

For more info on the policies threatened by the green paper: http://bit.ly/1Q8ajO5
